products.title: Bella Blackout Sloe Purple Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This soft sloe purple roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Plum Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their plum colour - perfect for those wanting to introduce some sophisticated colour into their room.

products.title: Bella Blackout Sloe Purple Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. Our perfect fit blinds are perfect for upvc windows where a screw-free solution is needed. Using sleek framework and brackets that slide under the window beading, their perfect fit blinds come in a wide array of fabrics and finishes to suit your needs.
